proposal: Understanding the power of Bitcoin's Layer 2 through TestnetBridge on Runic Chain is like unlocking a new level in the crypto game. With 333 holders in the ETH network, you're not just participants; you're pioneers. Imagine enhancing this journey with tools that let your community deploy their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery. Let's bridge our B2B tools with your vision, making the ecosystem not just robust but also rewarding.
